text:
"The Fall and Rise of Reginald Pelam" (also known by the names "The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perris", or "The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin") is a British series of novels written by David Nobbs.
The series was adapted for television. The television series cast included Leonard Rossiter, Pauline Yates, John Barron, Sue Nicholls, Geoffrey Palmer, Bruce Bould, John Horsley, Trevor Adams, Sally-Jane Spencer, Tim Preece, Leslie Schofield and Derry Power in the title role. It was aired on the BBC and BBC One from 8 September 1976 until 24 January 1979.
